sentences.english: Bureaucratic organizations strain the use of rules, regulations, procedures, policies and hierarchal authority.
sentences.chinese: 官僚机构劳损了规则，规定，程序，政策和层次权威。

sentences.english: Managing the relationship with bureaucrats will be another big challenge.
sentences.chinese: 处理与官僚的关系会是另一个重大挑战。

sentences.english: There were a few articles in the newspaper inveighing against bureaucracy.
sentences.chinese: 报纸上有几篇抨击官僚主义的文章。

sentences.english: There's a word I keep hearing lately: “technocrat.
sentences.chinese: 最近我一直能够听到一个词汇，那就是“技术官僚”。

sentences.english: Social networks can act as a counter-weight to arrogant bureaucracies.
sentences.chinese: 社会网络可以用来平衡一下傲慢的官僚机构。

sentences.english: Thus, retainers'system is an important way of forming bureaucracy system in the Warring States times.
sentences.chinese: 由此，家臣制便成为战国官僚制形成的重要途径。
工会使得劳动关系官僚化了。

sentences.english: So far as methods of management are concerned, we should lay particular stress on overcoming bureaucratism .
sentences.chinese: 在管理方法上，当前要特别注意克服官僚主义。

sentences.english: Of course, many bureaucracies suffer from communications problems, blurred lines of authority and plain old dumb decisions.
sentences.chinese: 当然，许多官僚机构有沟通问题，搞不清当局的方针。

sentences.english: Such bureaucratic subterfuge works on a small scale.
sentences.chinese: 像这些官僚式的托词只影响了一小范围。

sentences.english: Chapter three discusses the bureaucratic group and the congressional entrustment of legislation.
sentences.chinese: 第三章讨论官僚集团与国会立法权的委托。

sentences.english: I do not mean to offend the Earth god, but I use its image as a metaphor to mock at the corrupting bureaucrat culture.
sentences.chinese: 来听听如何透过土地公传达一些意象来调侃官僚文化。

sentences.english: This is a classic example of the killjoy attitudes of officialdom.
sentences.chinese: 这是那种典型的令人不快的官僚主义态度。

sentences.english: Crankishness aside, technocracy and autocracy have long been natural bedfellows.
sentences.chinese: 除了古怪之外，技术官僚和专制早就已经同床异梦。

sentences.english: It has less bureaucracy and, hence, lower administrative costs than private insurers.
sentences.chinese: 与私营保险比较，这项计划官僚程序少，行政成本低。

sentences.english: Some of the bureaucrats befooled the masses.
sentences.chinese: 某些官僚把群众当阿斗。

definition: land-owning class, esp. during Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties 魏晉南北朝|魏晋南北朝
a scholar or government official living in one's village/a village gentleman/squire
